fields.description:
h5.Description

To support attach requests in VS Code we need to be able detect what emulators and simulator are currently in a booted state.

Android: (perf concerns), need to call the isRunning function in avd to status when pulling the information together
iOS: Copy the {{device.state}} property onto the iOS simulator object [here|https://github.com/appcelerator/ioslib/blob/51030c67ce595dd0733d9b8d94eabca9884d861d/lib/simulator.js#L320-L341]
fields.summary: CLI: Add booted status to the info output for Android emulators and iOS simulators
